means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 艾弗里住所名称，来源于法国罗马人名+拉丁语，含义是“象牙”(ivory)+地点后缀acum

sentence.Network_en: He showed him how to blow into the ivory mouthpiece.
sentence.Network_cn: 他给他演示如何吹奏象牙吹口乐器。

sentence.Network_en: The Ivory Coast became the world's leading cocoa producer.
sentence.Network_cn: 象牙海岸成为世界上可可粉的主要产地。

sentence.Network_en: The rebels have opened the road from Monrovia to the Ivory Coast.
sentence.Network_cn: 叛乱分子已经开放了从蒙罗维亚到象牙海岸的道路。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French ivurie, based on Latin ebur

entry.def: Ivory is a hard cream-coloured substance which forms the tusks of elephants. It is valuable and can be used for making carved ornaments.

example.ex: ...the international ban on the sale of ivory.
example.tran: 禁止销售象牙的国际禁令

means.word_mean: 1. a hard smooth ivory colored dentine that makes up most of the tusks of elephants and walruses
2. a shade of white the color of bleached bones

sentences.en: My shirt is more ivory colour than white.
sentences.cn: 我的衬衣与其说是白色的, 不如说是乳白色的。

sentences.en: The museum has a fine collection of medieval ivories.
sentences.cn: 该博物馆收藏着一批精美的中世纪象牙制品。

jushi.english: He killed the elephant for its ivory.
jushi.chinese: 他为得到象牙而杀死了大象。
